  • Constructor Details

    • AuthorizationServiceTestITCase

      public AuthorizationServiceTestITCase()

  • Method Details

    • loadTestData

      @BeforeMethod public void loadTestData()

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers where the issuer and sub claim in the request identify one subscriber; 100000001, Daphne Oram.

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersAdditionalClaims

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersAdditionalClaims()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers when the issuer and claims in the request identify one subscriber; 100000008, University of Brighton. The request contains three claims. The sub claim identifies the subscriber, there are no subscribers associated with the groups claim and issuer, the brighton-acc-id claim name is not known to the system.

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleSubscribers

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleSubscribers()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers when the issuer and sub claim in the request identify two subscribers; 100000006, Klaus Schulze and 100000007, Klaus Schulze (work).

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleRequiredClaims

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleRequiredClaims()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers when the issuer and claims in the request identify one subscriber; 100000013, Balsdean Library. This subscriber requires two claims to be matched with claim names groups and branch-id.

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleSuppliedClaimValues

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleSuppliedClaimValues()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers when the issuer and claims in the request identify one subscriber; 100000015, Westdene Library. This subscriber requires the groups: staff claim to be matched, and the request contains two values for this claim one of which matches.

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleSuppliedAndRequiredClaimValues

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleSuppliedAndRequiredClaimValues()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers when the issuer and claims in the request identify one subscriber; 100000016, Brighton Libraries Admin. This subscriber requires the groups: staff and groups: admin claims to be matched, and the request contains three values for this claim two of which match.

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleRequiredClaimsOneNotMatched

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersMultipleRequiredClaimsOneNotMatched()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers when the issuer and claims in the request identify zero subscribers. The request includes an issuer and one claim that identifies a subscriber, but the other OIDC identifier claim associated with this subscriber is not matched.

    • testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersNotFound

      public void testGetSubscribersByOidcIdentifiersNotFound()
      Test getSubscribersByOidcIdentifiers when the issuer and claims in the request do not identify any subscribers.
